item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (465 points | 190 comments)
2. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (990 points | 772 comments)
3. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (677 points | 221 comments)
4. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (286 points | 138 comments)
5. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (87 points | 16 comments)
6. 91% of polled Amazon staff unhappy with RTO, 3-in-4 want to jump ship (35 points | 18 comments)
7. Poka Labs (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer ( | hide)
8. Hoodmaps: Publicly Annotated City Maps (61 points | 21 comments)
9. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (271 points | 145 comments)
10. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (229 points | 104 comments)
11. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (267 points | 87 comments)
12. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (28 points | 11 comments)
13. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (157 points | 46 comments)
14. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (39 points | 9 comments)
15. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (190 points | 204 comments)
16. Register Allocation in the Go Compiler (29 points | 1 comment)
17. I Built "The Monospace Web" (5 points | 3 comments)
18. Writing Portable Rendering Code with Nvrhi (8 points | discuss)
19. Rewriting Rust (277 points | 259 comments)
20. Why I still blog after 15 years (412 points | 205 comments)
21. Another new wasp species discovered by researchers (5 points | 1 comment)
22. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (144 points | 109 comments)
23. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (305 points | 103 comments)
24. Audio Masking (119 points | 18 comments)
25. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (104 points | 46 comments)
26. Show HN: King Thirteen: 2048 with chess pieces, in under 13 KB (196 points | 59 comments)
27. Optimizing Guile Scheme (156 points | 63 comments)
28. Mira Murati leaves OpenAI (696 points | 482 comments)
29. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (21 points | 3 comments)
30. Show HN: Fast and Exact Algorithm for Image Merging (103 points | 30 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
